meanings.definition: Relating to or involving multiple departments within an organization.
meanings.sent1: The interdepartmental meeting addressed issues from various departments.
meanings.sent2: The interdepartmental collaboration improved efficiency across teams.
meanings.sent3: The interdepartmental potluck showcased culinary diversity within the company.
meanings.sent4: Her interdepartmental approach to problem-solving bridged gaps between teams.
meanings.sent5: The interdepartmental structure promoted unity and shared goals among departments.

meanings.definition: In a manner that involves communication or coordination between different departments.
meanings.sent1: She communicated interdepartmentally to ensure all teams were aligned.
meanings.sent2: The report was circulated interdepartmentally for feedback.
meanings.sent3: The memo was passed around interdepartmentally, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: He coordinated interdepartmentally to streamline project timelines.
meanings.sent5: The manager liaised interdepartmentally to facilitate smooth transitions between teams.
